data.text: Davide niima wuyei looni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, siɛgi zu naa unmɔɔni da, é kula sili nuiti kpein zeezu, ma un ge la ma mɛɛ ga Sayile.
É ɠɛni ma:
nà-GALAGI, nà-fasai, ʋɛ gè lɔɔɠuzu ná,
Mamagi ɠa Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ!
«Mazɔlɔɔ saai ma ɗɛ lakpatakpagiti ti màaɓɔleni,
Gɔvɛalaazu ɠaluiti ti veleveleni mà,
Nà-kidaaʋiligi zu, gè wooɠulani Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma,
«Naazu, zooi ɓalini, é ɲiikpi,
Duului ɠa ɠulazu sokpayeɠeiti su,
É geeɠɔlɔgi ziɛni su, é yei,
É lɛɛni seeluɓɛin ɠɔma, é ɗa ɠoʋe,
É ɓɔɠɔ maaveleveleni ga kpidii, é lɔɔɠu su,
Wozakalagi, nii é ɠɛni tuɠɔ,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa zikɔzu geeɠɔlɔgi zu,
É mɛɛinti pilini ga é sili nuiti suvaza,
Kpoloɗɛi ɓomaʋɛ ɠulani kɛlɛma,
«É yeemaaleni, é yɛ geezuʋɛ, é nɔ̀un so,
É kùlani sìli nu wolai ya,
Ti wuzeɠeni dàalɔɠɔma nà-kidaaʋili foloi,
É kùlani faaɓaagi zu,
«Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI vaani bu, é sò eɠɛʋelei nà-telebodai la,
mazɔlɔɔ gè Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-peleiti sogɛ,
Gàazu ɠa ná-tɔgiti ba yeenɔpɛ,
Gè ɠɛni ga ziimai ɠɛ nui,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI sàlani nà-telebo fai maaʋele ma,
«Zɔi é è ʋɛ ga wooɠɛɠila nui, ɗa ɠɛ naa ʋɛ ga wooɠɛɠila GALAGI,
Zɔi ɲadegai, ɗa ɗa-ɲadedai lɛɛzu ga naa,
Ɗa maanɔɠɔ nuiti kizosu,
Ɗa ɠa è ga nà-wozakalagi, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Ni ɗa bà, nà ʋili salaʋusu ɓulugi zaama,
«GALA ná-peleiti daazeeliʋɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ ɓɛ ɠa é ga GALA, ni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laade?
GALA ka é ga nà-siɠi gaaɠoozagi, nii zeeɠaaɓaai,
Toɠa kɔ̀ɠɔiti kɛɛzu, eɠɛ dopai ɠɔɠɔiti,
Tɔ ɠa é màalɛlɛzu ga kɔɔɠɔ vai,
Unmɔɔgi è bosu ga ze, naa ɠa é ga nà-kɔɔɠɔ zɛpɛgi,
È-zaalai zu, nà ziɛzu valafala,
«Nà ʋilɛsu sìli nuiti polu, gè ti zuɠoloɠolo,
Gè ti-ma zuwu ɠaaleʋeni, gè ti ʋali ga,
Ɗa sàamaɠilizu ga zɛbɛi kɔɔɠɔ vai ma,
Ɗa sìli nuiti kpɛɛzu tùɠɔ,
Ti kpɔba nu ɠaiziaa, ti la sɔlɔɔni,
Nà ti ɠɛɛzu ga zooi ma vufiligi,
«È kùla nà-nuɓusɛiti ta-ɓaka fai laawu,
Wɛɛinti ta ʋaazu, ti ɗa tɛ̀ su.
Wɛɛinti ta iɲɔteʋei zu,
«Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa vulua! Mamagi ɠa bɛ, tɔ ɠa é ga nà-fasai!
GALAGI é zobo feezu bɛ̀, gè nɔ̀nɔ ʋotokula,
ɗa kùlazu sìli nuiti zea.
Naa ɠa é ba, nà è maamusɛ zii ɠiligiti saama, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI unmɔɔ faa wolai ɠɛa ná-masagi ʋɛ.
